name: Squadron
description:
This is an old school arcade shooter written in 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2022 based on the theme of 'Growth'. The game is inspired by the Sega vector arcade game Tac/Scan from 1982.

How To Play

Survive as long as possible and set a high score by navigating through an asteroid belt whilst under attack from an enemy fleet. The game is over when your red mothership is destroyed.

Your best chance of success is to collect friendly ships along the way which will join your squadron and as well as protecting your red mothership from harm will add to your firepower significantly.

Scoring
  • Enemy (1 hit) - 20 pts
  • Small rocks (3 hits) - 75 pts
  • Asteroid (8 hits) - 150 pts
  • Large Enemy (12 hits) - 500 pts
  • Collect Friendly Ship - 100 pts
